title: Modular Neural Network Design Course for Aircraft Trajectory Prediction

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of artificial intelligence/neural networks and Python programming experience
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented education utilizing real-time collaboration tools (Google Colab, GitHub)

learning_goals: A design framework for decomposing aircraft trajectory prediction problems into modular units can be explained.
Three or more neural network modules can be implemented using a divide-and-conquer approach.
The process of optimizing the predictive performance of modular networks by applying genetic algorithms can be demonstrated
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
